nodes.text: The Castilon Run Cup was a race hosted on Castilon in 34 ABY. The race was made up of several rounds, and the pilot Kazuda Xiono would eventually win the race, which allowed him to move on to the more difficult race, the Triple Dark Storm Cup.

The Castilon Run Cup first appeared in the non-canonical video game Star Wars Resistance Racer. The game has the option to race as Kazuda Xiono or Tamara Ryvora. This article assumes Kazuda, who is the default choice, is correct.
